message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $110. It's a fantastic deal that I think you won't want to pass up!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product but $110 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $105.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! I can do $108, but I think you'll find it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
